name: BRAINSTORMED 2: DEATH IS NOT THE END or, HYPERPHANTASIA
name_original: BRAINSTORMED 2: DEATH IS NOT THE END or, HYPERPHANTASIA
description:
A game about existing.

Relive the past. Death is not the end.

Fly through dream worlds of sublime beauty.

Scour the true names of God, and find out:

Why?

Contains:

  • Abstract religious melodrama with light first-person platforming
  • Deep lore and overarching story
  • Over 50 handcrafted worlds to explore
  • 998001 procedurally generated worlds to wander
  • The Book of None ".pdf" file
  • Ego Death

Theorize, Archive, and Explore on the Discord

EPILEPSY AND FLASHING COLORS WARNING!
